AVEVA Group PLC
16 September 2021
 

 

AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

 

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 14 September 2021 it was notified of the following share option exercises and sales which took place:

Claire Denton, Group General Counsel and Company Secretary

On 14 September 2021 Ms Denton exercised options over 588 shares under the AVEVA Group Senior Employee Restricted Share Plan 2015 at an exercise price of 35/9 pence per share and sold all resultant shares at a price of £39.35 per share.

 

Lisa Johnston, Chief Marking Officer and Chief Sustainability Officer

On 14 September 2021 Ms Johnston exercised options over 3,075 shares under the AVEVA Group Senior Employee Restricted Share Plan 2015 at an exercise price of 35/9 pence per share and sold 932 shares at a price of £38.91 per share to cover tax obligations and costs falling due in relation to the vesting of the awards.

Andrew McCloskey, Chief Technology Officer

On 14 September 2021 Mr McCloskey exercised options over 3,610 shares under the AVEVA Group Senior Employee Restricted Share Plan 2015 at an exercise price of 35/9  pence per share and sold 1,442 shares at a price of £38.91 per share to cover tax obligations and costs falling due in relation to the vesting of the awards.

Robert McGreevy, Head of M&A and Corporate Strategy

On 14 September 2021 Mr McGreevy exercised options over 1,100 shares under the AVEVA Group Senior Employee Restricted Share Plan 2015 at an exercise price of 35/9  pence per share and sold 403 share at a price of £38.91 per share to cover tax obligations and costs falling due in relation to the vesting of the awards.
